fields.label: Recruitment & Intake
fields.description: Activities related to attracting, recruiting, registering, and retaining students.

fields.label: Teaching and Learning
fields.description: Activities related to courses, classrooms, teaching, and learning.

fields.label: Graduation & Beyond
fields.description: Activities related to graduation rates, ceremonies, alumni, employment, and credential laddering.

fields.label: Student Experience
fields.description: Size, composition of student body, student satisfaction , academic and career outcomes

fields.label: Human Capital
fields.description: Faculty, Staff, and Administration - demand, supply, capacity, satisfaction

fields.label: Fiscal & Facilities
fields.description: Program costs, space allocation, specialized equipment, tuition, funding

fields.label: Reputation
fields.description: How is the program perceived by prospective students and their families, the ministry, other academic institutions, and the local community?

fields.label: Student Recruitment
fields.description: Assesses interest in and demand for program.

fields.label: Classroom Experience
fields.description: Assess teaching & learning,  student perceptions and satisfaction

fields.label: Graduate Success
fields.description: Assess program outcomes, graduation rates, after-grad employment, and engagement of Alumni

fields.label: Classroom Infrastructure
fields.description: Assess program's use and demand for classroom space, equipment, etc.

fields.label: Faculty & Staff Capacity
fields.description: Assess expertise, experience, capacity of faculty, staff, admin to deliver on program learning objectives.

fields.label: Recuitment Costs
fields.description: Cost of program marketing and recruitment efforts, effectiveness, ROI

fields.label: Brand Recognition
fields.description: Assess the degree to which program is recognized, in both domestic and international markets.

fields.label: Academic Integrity
fields.description: Assess rigour and academic standards, and how program is received by other institutions and public.

fields.label: Alumni as Citizens
fields.description: Assess success of program alumni and the degree to which they are engaged, productive citizens

fields.label: Business-Higher Education Forum (2017, PDF)
fields.description: Demand analysis for DS programs in US

fields.label: BSc Goals and Objectives (2018) (pdf)
fields.description: Data Science Program Goals and Student Learning Outcomes

fields.label: Berkley DS Curric. Guidelines (pdf)
fields.description: Data Science Curriculum Guidelines

fields.label: Student demand
fields.description: Historical, present, and future demand for the program

fields.label: Learning Objectives
fields.description: Evaluate course and program learning objectives

fields.label: Student Evaluations
fields.description: Metrics from faculty, course, and program evaluations / feedback

fields.label: % rank above average
fields.description: Percentage of students ranking program courses as "above average" or better

fields.label: Average rank for courses
fields.description: Rank (out of 5) from student evaluations across all courses in program.

fields.label: Average rank for instructors
fields.description: Rank (out of 5) from student evaluations across all instructors in program.

fields.label: Courses objectives are achievable and rigorous
fields.description: Subjective assessment of course-level objectives for all required courses in program.

fields.label: Program objectives are achievable and meaninful
fields.description: Subjective assessment of program goals and objectives.

fields.label: Apply / Accept  ratio
fields.description: Ratio of program applications to accepted students.
